Title: Effects of Organizational Changes on Product Metrics and Defects
UseOF-SZZ: To locate the origins of a change done in the code
Summary:
We conduct statistical analysis to investigate the relationship between
the origins, product metrics, the number of modifications, and defects.
Outcome:
Files that are modified by multiple organizations or developed by later 
    organizations tend to be faultier due to the increase in complexity and modification frequency.
